Language: Starting a new game will overwrite the saved data.
English: Starting a new game will overwrite the saved data.

Language: Are you sure you want to continue?
English: Are you sure you want to continue?
Chinese: 開始新遊戲將會覆蓋存檔，確定要繼續嗎？

English: Starting a new game will overwrite the saved data.
Chinese: 開啟新遊戲將會覆蓋先前的存檔，確定要繼續嗎？

English: Tap the screen to begin the tutorial...

Language: 靠近地上的物品並點擊圖示撿起
English: Approach items on the ground and click the icon to pick them up.
Chinese: 靠近地上的物品並點擊圖示撿起

Language: 有隻可愛的烏龜！\n(輕觸螢幕繼續...)
English: There's an adorable turtle!\n(Tap the screen to continue...)
Chinese: 有隻可愛的烏龜！\n(輕觸螢幕繼續...)

English: Tap here to check the turtle's status.

Language:
隨時注意烏龜血量，
千萬不能讓烏龜死掉！

透過面板可以切換烏龜狀態，分別為 [跟隨]，[休息] 以及 [躲藏]


點擊空白處關閉此面板…
English:
Always keep an eye on the turtle's health.
Never let the turtle die!

You can switch the turtle's status using the panel: [Follow]，[Rest]， and [Hide].


Click anywhere to close this panel…
Chinese:
隨時注意烏龜血量，
千萬不能讓烏龜死掉！

透過面板可以切換烏龜狀態，分別為 [跟隨]，[休息] 以及 [躲藏]


點擊空白處關閉此面板…

Language: 點擊背包圖示打開背包
English: Click the backpack icon to open the backpack.
Chinese: 點擊背包圖示打開背包

Language: 點擊物品查看該物品的資訊
English: Click on items to view their information.
Chinese: 點擊物品查看該物品的資訊

Language: 點擊[餵食]可以讓烏龜吃下去，\n也可以從背包直接將物品拖曳到烏龜身上
English: Click [Feed] to feed the turtle，\nor you can drag items directly from the backpack onto the turtle.
Chinese: 點擊[餵食]可以讓烏龜吃下去，\n也可以從背包直接將物品拖曳到烏龜身上

Language: 教學完成！\n帶著你的龜龜去探險吧！
English: Tutorial complete!\nTake your turtle on an adventure!
Chinese: 教學完成！\n帶著你的龜龜去探險吧！
拖曳攻擊按鈕，瞄準後放開
